get_started.heading: Welcome Students!
get_started.desc:
We are glad that you have signed-up to this program and joined us in this exciting journey of nurturing an experience of learning, skilling and innovation for the young people. As you are aware you will be playing a role of student for the participants in their learning journey.

This portal gives you an experience of learning modules and important resources for supporting the participants. You can also register and track progress of your teams using the dashboard.

Your journey as a teacher/mentor will involve the following key milestones:

  • Step-1: Take Pre-Survey
  • Step-2: Complete the course and reading material
  • Step-3: Register the teams
  • Step-4: Support the participants in completing the learning journey.
  • Step-5: Support the participants in challenge/idea submission.
  • Step-6: Complete the post survey.

We hope you and your teams will have a great learning experience and wish you all the best for this program!

teacher_get_started.heading: Welcome Teachers and Mentors!
teacher_get_started.desc:
We are glad that you have signed-up to this program and joined us in this exciting journey of nurturing an experience of learning, skilling and innovation for the young people. As you are aware you will be playing a role of guide and mentor for the participants in their learning journey.

This portal gives you an experience of learning modules and important resources for supporting the participants. You can also register and track progress of your teams using the dashboard.

Your journey as a teacher/mentor will involve the following key milestones:

  • Step-1: Take Pre-Survey.

  • Step-2: Complete the course and reading material.

  • Step-3: Register the teams

  • Step-4: Support the participants in completing the learning journey.

  • Step-5: Support the participants in challenge/idea submission.

  • Step-6: Complete the post survey.

We hope you and your teams will have a great learning experience and wish you all the best for this program!

student_get_started.heading: Welcome Students!
student_get_started.desc:
We are glad that you are part of this program and have joined us in this exciting journey of learning, skilling and innovation. There are many exciting things awaiting you in this journey.

You will learn through this platform, work with your team and be supported by your teachers as well.

Your journey as a participant will involve the following key steps:

  • Step 1: Take Pre-Survey

  • Step 2: Start the course by watching the video.

  • Step 3: Complete each module and attempt the Quiz.

  • Step 4: Work with your team on the worksheets in each module to complete your own problem solving journey.

  • Step 5: Submit your team’s final idea.

  • Step 6: Complete the post survey.

We hope you and your teams will have a great learning experience and wish you all the best for this program!

student.worksheet:
Dear Student,

Step-1: Download and print this worksheet or get a copy from your Unisolve guide teacher.

Step-2: Complete this worksheet along with your team members.

Step-3: Upload the worksheets onto the portal using the 'Upload File' button. You can upload multiple documents as images or documents. Only one team member from the team needs to upload the Worksheet. If needed, you can ask for your Guide teachers support in doing this.

Step-4: Continue to next lessons only after your team has completed and uploaded the worksheet.

Hope you and your team learn new things and enjoy completing this worksheet.
student.take_challenge: Test your course skills in a short test challenge!
student.ref_quiz_heading: Let's think about a few things you learnt in the video

If your Initial, Full Name is missing or incorrect request your guide teacher to update the name in Teams Page of Teacher Login</br>(There should NOT be any ‘.’ in the name. Example: If your full name is  K. Vijay Kumar it should be added as K Vijay Kumar with out any .(dot) or special characters)</br></br>Note:
